column2: an A.M. Eatery////The negatives to our visit were that the the plates were very greasy and we were only checked on once
column3: so there was no opportunity to ask for napkins. The boyfriend got tired of waiting around
column4: so he walked to where the servers were congregated to ask someone to grab him a hot sauce. There were also quite a few flies hovering around
column5: which is most likely a result of people waiting in line with the open since there's not much space between it and the hostess stand.
